âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Reverse image search across multiple engines (SauceNao, IQDB, Ascii2D, trace.moe, Google, TinEye, Yandex, Bing, etc.) â€¢ GUI for Windows â€¢ Cross-platform command-line interface (Rdx) â€¢ Configurable search behavior â€¢ Context menu integration (for GUI)
ðŸ“– Summary: SmartImage is a C# application that provides a powerful reverse image search functionality. It allows users to find the source of an image by querying multiple popular search engines simultaneously and presenting the best match directly in the browser. It offers both a Windows GUI and a cross-platform command-line interface.
